sentences.en: Before them a wide and rapid current coursed athwart their way.
sentences.cn: 在他们面前,一条宽而急的河流,挡住他们的去路.

sentences.en: His tendency toward violence was athwart the philosophy of the peace movement.
sentences.cn: 他倾向于用暴力,这可是跟和平运动的宗旨背道而驰的.

sentences.en: On one another, as they strike athwart.
sentences.cn: 翅膀碰上了翅膀,彼此瞪着.

sentences.en: Rudderless , we drift athwart a tempest, and when once the storm of youth is past.
sentences.cn: 我们迷航飘荡于风暴中, 青春的雷雨一旦过去.

sentences.en: The pagoda cast its shadow athwart the lake.
The ship steamed athwart the tug.
sentences.cn: 船朝着那条拖船横向驶去.

sentences.en: The ship was anchored athwart at the harbor mouth.
sentences.cn: 轮船横着停泊在港口里.

sentences.en: The ship was anchored athwart the harbour mouth.
sentences.cn: 轮船横着停泊在港囗里.

sentences.en: They put a table athwart the doorway.
sentences.cn: 他们把桌子横放在门口。

sentences.en: Unexpected events thrust themselves continually athwart our path.
sentences.cn: 在我们工作的进程中,出乎意料的事层出不穷.

sentences.en: Whatsoever comes athwart his affection ranges evenly with mine ( Shakespeare )
sentences.cn: 违逆他的情感的东西也违逆了我的情感 ( 莎士比亚 )

trans.tran_cn: 横跨于，与…不一致；与…相反
